mads.note: Brill's New Pauly: "Arrian, 3, Anonymus author of a Periplus Ponti Euxini, Term for the anonymous author of one Periplus Ponti Euxini which is primarily based on the Periplus of Menippus in the epitome of Marcianus, the Periplus of Arrianus [2], Ps. Scymnus and Ps. Scylax; probably written after AD 576...."Badian, Ernst (Cambridge, MA) and Heucke, Clemens (Munich), “Arrianus”, in: Brill’s New Pauly, Antiquity volumes edited by: Hubert Cancik and , Helmuth Schneider. Consulted online on 27 July 2017
